content: Announcement: Should anyone be in need of using the tool Torinox from Firely (https://simplifier.net/downloads/torinox) but not being fond of installing the dotnet core SDK on one's machine or CD/CI pipeline environment, I've created a publicly available Linux docker image containing Torinox and nothing else. Find it on https://hub.docker.com/r/jkiddo/torinox/tags
@Vadim Peretokin @Michel Rutten
Get it to work by eg: docker run jkiddo/torinox fhir -h

@Jens Villadsen help me......sir
I am trying to deploy my Node.JS site , I keep getting this error "Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 503 (Service Unavailable) on inspect console..... using window docker image
